TableContextTimeStampAfterTable: {68195=May 16, 2015, 82409=July 27, 2014, 77299=August 31, 2014, 63514=June 15, 2015, 73566=October 3, 2014, 78785=August 6, 2014, 64992=June 9, 2015, 75108=September 16, 2014, 71523=October 8, 2014, 58329=July 14, 2015, 80666=July 28, 2014, 61979=June 23, 2015, 66689=June 2, 2015, 70045=October 27, 2014, 76677=Hannah, the owner was absolutely wonderful. She had tea/coffee and scones for us when we arrived.We were there early September and there was a triathlon that weekend which made for a really fun Saturday. It all happened right outside our door! That night at the pub two doors down there was live Irish music played by the locals.The scenery and surroundings on the peninsula are beautiful. We were made to feel welcomed by everyone in town! Take advantage of the bicycle rentals and explore the area.}
